member.name: E:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.ValueChanged
member.summary: Called during a drag when the user is selecting a new value for the pointer by dragging.
member.seealso: While dragging the pointer, there are other events (ValueChanging, ValueChangeStarted and ValueChangeCompleted).
member.remarks: This event is used to know the pointer value changed, when the user change pointer value dynamically or changing pointer value by dragging.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.ValueChangeStarted
member.summary: Called when the user starts selecting a new value of pointer by dragging.
member.seealso: While dragging the pointer, there are other events (ValueChanging, ValueChanged and ValueChangeCompleted) will be called after the ValueChangeStarted event.
member.remarks: This event shouldn't be used to update the pointer value (use ValueChanged event for that), but rather to be notified when the user has started selecting a new value by starting a drag. The value passed will be the last value that the pointer had before the change began.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.ValueChangeCompleted
member.summary: Called when the user is done selecting a new value of the pointer by dragging.
member.seealso: While dragging the pointer, there are other events (ValueChangeStarted, ValueChanged and ValueChangeCompleted) will be called before the ValueChangeCompleted event.
member.remarks: This event shouldn't be used to update the pointer value (use onValueChanged for that), but rather to notify the new value before when the user has completed selecting a new value by drag . ///

member.name: E:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.ValueChanging
member.summary: Called during a drag when the user is selecting before a new value for the pointer by dragging
member.seealso: While dragging the pointer, there are other events (ValueChangeStarted, ValueChanged and ValueChangeCompleted).
member.remarks: This event shouldn't be used to update the pointer value (use ValueChanged event for that), but rather to know the new value before when the user has completed selecting a new value by drag.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the Value that decides the position of the CircularPointer in the CircularScale.
member.remarks: Value property is one of the most important property. Based on the Value property pointer has been positioned on the CircularScale. Value should resides between the start and end value of the scale. If the value of this property is less than StartValue of the CircularScale, then the StartValue of the CircularScale is set to the Value of the pointer. Similarly EndValue of the CircularScale is set to the Value of the pointer when Value is greater that EndValue of the scale.
